Class DayOfWeekComposite

                  speedscheduler.DayOfWeekComposite
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable
 class DayOfWeekComposite
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite

A widget that draws checkboxes for each day of the week and provides accessor methods for fetching user input.

Field Summary
private  boolean[] selectedDays
          Stores which days have been selected with the widget.

Field Detail

selectedDays

private boolean[] selectedDays
Stores which days have been selected with the widget. Index 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, ..., and 6 is Saturday.

Method Detail

createDayOfWeekCheckbox

private org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Button createDayOfWeekCheckbox(int dayOfWeek)
Factory to crank out a checkbox for a day of the week, complete with text and a listener that calls handleDayOfWeekClick() on clicks.

Parameters:
dayOfWeek - The day of the week index from 0 to TimeUtils.WEEK_LEN-1.
Returns:
A Button ready for action.

handleDayOfWeekClick

private void handleDayOfWeekClick(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Button buttonClicked,
                                  int dayOfWeek)
When a day-of-week checkbox is clicked.

setDaySelected

private void setDaySelected(int dayOfWeek,
                            boolean selected)
Wrapper access to selectedDays array.

initializeSelectedDays

private void initializeSelectedDays(boolean[] defaultSelectedDays)
Initializes all days to false or to the specified defaults.

isDaySelected

protected boolean isDaySelected(int dayOfWeek)
Gets whether a day is selected by day index.

Parameters:
dayOfWeek - Valid range is from 0 to TimeUtils.WEEK_LEN-1, where 0 represents the first day of the week (typically Sunday) and TimeUtils.WEEK_LEN-1 (typically 6, ie Saturday) represents the last day of the week.
Returns:
True if the specified dayOfWeek is selected, or false if not.

getSelectedDays

protected boolean[] getSelectedDays()
Get the selected days array. This returns an array of booleans of length TimeUtils.WEEK_LEN (typically 7) where each entry in the array indicates whether the day is selected (true) or not (false).

Returns:
The array of boolean selected days.

dumpSelectedDays

private void dumpSelectedDays()
Prints to stderr the status for each day (whether selected or not)
